introduction.description: I’m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm building Maintainable, Scalable and Reliable applications at

aboutMe.title: About Me
content: I'm a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm building Maintainable, Scalable and Reliable applications at Oracle.

description: Built the initial Proof of Concept for AutoDQ, an automated data-quality validation system.
Developed a FastAPI backend, real-time React dashboard, and integrated Llama 3.1 for intelligent testing.
Improved data reliability by delivering a pluggable service for seamless integration across enterprise systems.
Built AI-driven workflows for ad-video generation, pitch decks, and business plans.
Developed a scalable frontend using React and Turbo (monorepo) with a robust Node.js + Express backend.
Deployed and managed cloud infrastructure on GCP while optimizing SQL databases for workflow data.
Developing web and app solutions for NIT Trichy’s official coding and app-dev team.
Designed and deployed production-ready platforms used across college events, fests, and admin systems.
Delivered applications serving 10,000+ annual users with strong reliability and performance.

projects.name: Festember App 24'
projects.description: A cross-platform Kotlin Multiplatform app built with Ktor, Koin, Realm, and Voyager. Implemented DAuth authentication and integrated the Golang Fest API, scaling to 1500+ users in 4 days with dynamic CMS-driven content delivery.

projects.name: TimeWarp Game
projects.description: A puzzle-adventure game where players solve challenges across pixelated worlds using an in-game code editor. Contributed to game design, UI, and full-stack development, leading to 300+ players in a ₹25,000 prize event.

projects.name: Superhero Call Center
projects.description: A real-time superhero resource management game featuring a 3D interactive city map. Built using Golang, MongoDB, Redis, React, WebSocket, Three.js, and Gemini AI. Implemented real-time crime events, strategic lineup management, and a dynamic crime bar system with optimized backend calculations and smooth user interaction.

otherProjects.title: Pragyan App
otherProjects.description: A Kotlin Multiplatform Android app using Ktor, Voyager, Koin, and Realm for a fast, offline-ready fest companion experience.

otherProjects.title: Fluentify
otherProjects.description: A MERN-based language learning platform with WebRTC-powered real-time video sessions for immersive speaking practice.

otherProjects.title: AcreWise
otherProjects.description: A blockchain-powered RoW management tool with interactive mapping, smart route planning, and transparent land data access.

otherProjects.title: Insight-AI
otherProjects.description: An AI-driven research tool enabling automated interviews, real-time chat insights, and analytics dashboards.

otherProjects.title: SurgiAssist-AI
otherProjects.description: An agentic AI system that analyzes OR audio to auto-update checklists and generate real-time surgical summaries.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch.
getInTouch.content: I’m looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll try my best to get back to you!
